Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape
    The RegularPolygon class is used to model regular n-sided polygons, it is a subclass of the Shape class.
    Author:
    Hu Qiyun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Constructor of RegularPolygon class, set the sides to be 3 and radius to be 1.0.
      RegularPolygon(int n)
      Constructor of RegularPolygon class, set the sides to be n(or 3 if n is smaller than 3) and radius to be 1.0.
      RegularPolygon(int n, double r)
      Constructor of RegularPolygon class, set the sides to be n(or 3 if n is smaller than 3) and radius to be r(or 0.0 if r is smaller than 0).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(double x, double y)
      This method determines whether a point (x,y) in the screen coordinate system is contained by the polygon.
      int getNumOfSides()
      Getter of NumOfSides, returns the value of numOfSides.
      double getRadius()
      Getter of radius, returns the value of radius.
      void setNumOfSides(int numOfSides)
      Setter of NumOfSides, sets a new value of numOfSides and also reset the local coordinates of the vertices.
      void setRadius(double radius)
      Getter of radius, sets a new value of radius, and also reset the local coordinates of the vertices.

      • Methods inherited from class Shape

        getColor, getFilled, getTheta, getX, getXc, getXLocal, getY, getYc, getYLocal, rotate, setColor, setFilled, setTheta, setXc, setXLocal, setYc, setYLocal, translate

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Constructor of RegularPolygon class, set the sides to be 3 and radius to be 1.0.

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int n)
        Constructor of RegularPolygon class, set the sides to be n(or 3 if n is smaller than 3) and radius to be 1.0.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of the sides of the Regular Polygon.

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int n,
                      double r)
        Constructor of RegularPolygon class, set the sides to be n(or 3 if n is smaller than 3) and radius to be r(or 0.0 if r is smaller than 0).
        Parameters:
        n - The number of the sides of the Regular Polygon the type is int.
        r - The radius of the Regular Polygon the type is double.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumOfSides

        public int getNumOfSides()
        Getter of NumOfSides, returns the value of numOfSides.
        Returns:
        The number of the sides of the Regular Polygon.

      • setNumOfSides

        public void setNumOfSides(int numOfSides)
        Setter of NumOfSides, sets a new value of numOfSides and also reset the local coordinates of the vertices.
        Parameters:
        numOfSides - The number of the sides of the Regular Polygon.

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Getter of radius, returns the value of radius.
        Returns:
        The radius of the Regular Polygon.

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double radius)
        Getter of radius, sets a new value of radius, and also reset the local coordinates of the vertices.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the Regular Polygon.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(double x,
                        double y)
        This method determines whether a point (x,y) in the screen coordinate system is contained by the polygon.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the point being tested.
        y - y-coordinate of the point being tested.
        Returns:
        a Boolean value whether a point (x,y) in the screen coordinate system is contained by the polygon.
